segments.text: Oh my gosh, I just noticed the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring from the faucet and cascading over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, drying a plate, totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddleâ€”how has she not slipped yet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't see the kids at first, but there's a boy on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar, stool wobbling wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll topple backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is beside him, arm up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're collaborating on this sneaky cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a calm garden, such a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are dripping with water now from the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is full of hidden dangers I almost missed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's shocking how much is going wrong unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
